top_comments.comment: Now I want fish and chips.
Erm. As a British viewer.....excuse me? Where did this anti UK stuff come from. Also I REALLY don't think an American should be saying that our food is crap lol

This was a nice change for MSNBC. Great piece! Except the British food comment. There are plenty of great English dishes. It’s kind of like saying rap sucks. There’s some decent rap if you look hard enough.
